column4: hi guys.  is there a way to make the live cd install via text mode?  I've got an old system that I need to install on, it won't run the live CD and it won't boot off CDs that I've burnt myself. :-(
so I can't use the altenative cd.
I have, but I have to burn that myself.  this sytem seems to only boot 'proper' cds, not cdrs
yeah I'm pretty sure live cd has no text mode, I just wanted to check.
thanks for your help; I found a way around my problem. official 5.10 install cd, then dist-upgrade. :-)
